text: Yoav Pini Gerafi (sometimes Jarafi or Jerafi,http://www.uefa.com/european- qualifiers/teams/players/250129030--yoav- jarafi/https://scores24.live/en/soccer/p-yoav-pini-jerafi ; born 29 August 1993) is an Israeli footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for F.C. Ashdod. ==Club career== Gerafi made his professional debut for Hapoel Ra'anana in the Israeli Premier League on 14 February 2015, coming on as a substitute in the 14th minute for Shoval Gozlan after starting goalkeeper Daniel Lifshitz was sent off in the 11th minute. The match finished as a 2–1 win for Hapoel Ra'anana. ==International career== Gerafi was called up to the Israel national team for the first time in March 2019 for the UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying matches against Slovenia and Austria. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tel Mond Category:Israeli footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Hapoel Kfar Saba F.C. players Category:F.C.
